## Who Am I?

Hello and welcome to my personal webpage! I am a cognitive psychologist, with a focus on psychometric research and computational modeling.

I am currently working as an SNF Ambizione Fellow associated with the \[Cognitive Psychology Lab\](https://www.psychology.uzh.ch/en/areas/nec/allgpsy.html) (PI: \[Klaus Oberauer\](https://www.psychology.uzh.ch/en/areas/nec/allgpsy/team/head/oberauer.html)) at the \[Department of Psychology\](https://www.psychology.uzh.ch/en.html) of the \[University of Zurich\](https://www.uzh.ch/en.html).
:::
